snippet: The tepid ratings for Simon Cowell’s two-year-old show are yet more evidence that singing competitions are not the blockbusters they once were.
abstract: Tepid ratings for Simon Cowell’s two-year-old television show, The X Factor, are yet more evidence that singing competitions are not blockbusters they once were.
lead_paragraph: The tepid ratings for Simon Cowell’s two-year-old show are yet more evidence that singing competitions are not the blockbusters they once were.

headline.main: ‘X-Factor’ Hits a New Ratings Low in Its Season Premiere
